SELECT COUNT(CUSTOMER_CODE) FROM OISONE_CUSTOMER WHERE IS_NOTICE = 'N'
AND ${searchKeyword} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue} ||'%'

SELECT CUSTOMER_CODE , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE , WRITER , TITLE , CONTENT , IS_READ , SECRET_NUMBER , IS_NOTICE FROM OISONE_CUSTOMER WHERE 1 = 1 AND IS_NOTICE = 'Y'
AND ${searchKeyword} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue} ||'%'
ORDER BY CUSTOMER_CODE DESC
SELECT CUSTOMER_CODE , WRITER , TITLE , CONTENT , SECRET_NUMBER , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE , IS_READ FROM OISONE_CUSTOMER WHERE CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode}
